nasaclimate1866513835647001047.content: November 2024 was the second-hottest November in @NASAGISS’ record, GISTEMP. This Nov. was 1.31°C (or about 2.36°F) above the long-term 1951-1980 average. The above-average temperatures continue a long-term warming trend driven by human activities.
nasaclimate1866513835647001047.author: nasaclimate
